# Vance, a Onetime Critic of Trump, Is Selected as His Running Mate

**BY MICHAEL GOLD**

MILWAUKEE — Former President Donald J. Trump has chosen Senator J.D. Vance of Ohio to be his running mate, wagering that the young senator will bring fresh energy to the Republican ticket and ensure that the movement. Mr. Vance began nearly a decade ago as his own alter ego.
